alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Richland; Wibaux (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 28 at 7:48PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Wibaux, southeastern Dawson and southeastern Richland Counties through 845 PM MDT... At 746 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 17 miles northwest of Carlyle, or 18 miles southwest of Wibaux, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wibaux, Savage, Intake, Carlyle, Skaar, Hodges, Saint Phillip, Midway, Burns and Yates. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
